note: 12 gates with descriptions and pain point mappings

gates.title: Men's Mental Health
gates.description: Tools for emotional resilience, clarity, and grounded self-leadership.

gates.title: Women's Mental Health
gates.description: Tools for stress relief, self-trust, and steady emotional balance.

gates.title: Addiction Recovery
gates.description: Tools for recovery, cravings, and rebuilding stability over time.

gates.title: Fathers & Sons
gates.description: Tools for guidance, trust, and stronger father-son connection.

gates.title: Teen & Gen Z
gates.description: Tools for focus, identity, confidence, and emotional regulation.

gates.title: Grief & Loss
gates.description: Tools for mourning, memory, and moving through loss with care.

gates.title: Financial Collapse & Purpose
gates.description: Tools for rebuilding direction, stability, and purpose after setbacks.

gates.title: Trauma Rebuild
gates.description: Tools for safety, nervous system grounding, and gradual recovery.

gates.title: Heartbreak Loop
gates.description: Tools for breakups, rumination, and regaining emotional footing.

gates.title: Identity Crisis
gates.description: Tools for clarity, values, and rebuilding a stable sense of self.

gates.title: Full Resurrection System
gates.description: Tools to rebuild life systems step by step after collapse.

gates.title: Loneliness & Social Disconnection
gates.description: Tools for feeling less alone, rebuilding connection, and understanding why disconnection hurts.
